name: Lucid Color Set
summary: Learn about .LUCIDCOLORSET files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The LUCIDCOLORSET file can be found by following these steps:
Open the Finder window and right-click the Lucid application icon in the location you saved it (most likely under Applications).
Select Show Package Contents → Contents → Resources → ColorSets, the files will be located in this folder.

description: A LUCIDCOLORSET file was created for use with Lucid, a JavaScript animation builder program. It contains data Lucid references to determine the color of in-program objects (e.g. the Google Map button).
